lead_paragraph: This documentary by Jen Senko shows how her father became what she considers a casualty of the most conservative elements of the media.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘The Brainwashing of My Dad’ Examines the Influence of Right-Wing News Media
headline.main: Review: ‘The Brainwashing of My Dad’ Examines the Influence of Right-Wing News Media

snippet: This documentary by Jen Senko shows how her father became what she considers a casualty of the most conservative elements of the media.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Jen Senko documentary film The Brainwashing of My Dad.
